title: What is the use of quantum computing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Quantum computing will be very useful in complex and vast calculations because it uses quantum superposition for obtaining exponential speedup in computation. The areas like Artificial intelligence, Drug discovery, new materials development, deep space travel etc.

Quantum internet + Quantum teleportation As it will be based on entanglement, information can be transferred to any place in the universe instantaneously. But of course it will be limited due to human's reachability.
